document.full_text: britain's luke donald said he felt "invincible" after a seven-under 64 gave him the first-round lead while several golfing heavyweights labored on a torrid day for scoring in the pga championship on thursday.
document.title: "invincible" donald takes charge at wild wentworth
lines_and_colors: britain's luke donald said he felt "invincible" after a seven-under 64 gave him the first-round lead while several golfing heavyweights labored on a torrid day for scoring in the pga championship on thursday.
